attributes.action: Not allow the BBC to pay with taxpayers money such vast salaries to presenters such as to Jonathan Ross.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be a cap on earnings for BBC presenters. To pay millions to certain presenters with our licence fee is appauling. Regulation should be brought in to stop this happening and a cap should be put on earnings. After all many of us are struggling to pay our gas bills at the moment!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
